thread.title: Lady Liberty Will Be Portrayed As a Black Woman on Currency for the First Time in History
thread.title_full: Lady Liberty Will Be Portrayed As a Black Woman on Currency for the First Time in History

author: Dayna Evans
title: Lady Liberty Will Be Portrayed As a Black Woman on Currency for the First Time in History
text: Last August, Treasury Secretary Jacob Lew announced that abolitionist leader Harriet Tubman would be replacing Andrew Jackson on the $20 bill. And though it will take years until the Tubman $20 makes it into steady circulation, there’s something to look forward to in the meantime: The... More »
